s0132: King Wu charged forward, the Zhou troops all collapsed and rebelled against Zhou.
s0133: Zhou fled, returned and ascended the Deer Tower, covered himself with his precious jades, and burned himself to death in the fire.
s0134: King Wu held the great white banner to command the lords, all the lords bowed to King Wu, King Wu then bowed to the lords, all the lords followed.
s0135: King Wu arrived at the Shang state, the common people of Shang all waited in the suburbs.
s0136: Therefore King Wu sent his ministers to announce to the Shang common people: 'Heaven has sent down good fortune!'
s0137: The Shang people all bowed twice with heads to ground, King Wu also returned the bow.
s0138: King Wu entered the palace, sat on the great throne, the lords all presented their captives.
s0139: King Wu made the proclamation to the four directions: 'The ancients had a saying: 'Do not kill those who surrender.'
s0140: I am not an executioner, do not kill the captives.'
s0141: King Wu released the imprisoned Jizi, restored the imprisoned Bi Gan.
s0142: He searched for the imprisoned Xiahou Shang, found him and released him.
s0143: He made the Duke of Zhou guard the eastern regions.
s0144: In the twelfth year, King Wu died.
s0145: King Cheng was young, the Duke of Zhou acted as regent.
s0146: The three guards rebelled, saying: 'The Duke of Zhou will harm the young king.'
s0147: The Duke of Zhou went to the eastern capital, put down the rebellion.
s0148: He moved the Yin people to Luo, established the eastern capital.
s0149: He made the Da Gao proclamation, comforted the Yin people.
s0150: He made the Kang Gao proclamation, established the ritual system.
s0151: He made the Jun Shi proclamation, divided the lands.
s0152: He made the Luo Gong proclamation, established the well-field system.
s0153: He made the wine prohibition proclamation, banned drunkenness.
s0154: King Cheng grew up, the Duke of Zhou returned the government.
s0155: King Cheng was diligent in government, the world was at peace.
s0156: King Cheng died, King Kang ascended.
s0157: King Kang monitored the eastern regions, toured the lords, administered justice.
s0158: Forty years without punishment, the world was at peace under King Kang.
s0159: King Kang died, King Zhao ascended.
s0160: King Zhao went south to tour, died at the Han River.
s0162: King Mu was ambitious and fond of grandeur, personally drove the eight horses.
s0163: He went west to attack the Quanrong, obtained four white wolves and four white deer.
s0164: He made Zhao Ju the Grand Master, prepared to attack the Quanrong.
s0165: The Quanrong submitted, King Mu stopped.
s0166: He toured the north, reached the Great Wall.
s0167: He saw the Yellow Emperor's Xuanyuan Terrace.
s0168: He returned and died at Haojing.
s0169: King Mu's son King Gong ascended.
s0170: King Gong died, his younger brother King Yi ascended.
s0171: King Yi died, King Xiao ascended.
s0172: King Xiao died, King Li ascended.
s0173: King Li was tyrannical, the common people rebelled.
s0174: King Li fled to Zhi, died there.
s0175: The common people made Duke Wu of Gonghe regent.
s0176: Fourteen years, King Xuan ascended, the Gonghe administration ended.
s0177: King Xuan revived Zhou's prosperity, moved the capital to Luoyi.
s0178: He attacked the Quanrong, drove them out.
s0179: He attacked the Jiang, defeated them.
s0180: He attacked the Xu Yan, captured their king.
s0181: Two younger brothers of the same mother, Yi Zhongyan, gave birth to Gongsun Wuzhi.
